entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:41 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:41 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
